###Part 1: DNA Strings

####Import Data
```{r}
beta_gliadin_raw <- read_lines("C:\\BI485\\emmons_kelsea\\hw09\\beta_gliadin.txt", skip = 1)
beta_gliadin_raw
```

####From Many Strings to One
```{r}
beta_gliadin <- beta_gliadin_raw %>% 
  str_replace_all("\\s", "\\") %>% 
  str_replace_all("\\d", "\\") 
beta_gliadin
```

```{r}
beta_gliadin <- beta_gliadin %>% 
  str_c(collapse = "")
beta_gliadin
```
